DateParseToUtc(string, string, TimeZoneRegion, int?)

Converts a string date to UTC DateTime using either a region or a custom offset.

public static DateTime DateParseToUtc(this string value, string format = "dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss", TimeZoneRegion fromTimeZoneRegion = TimeZoneRegion.Brasilia, int? offsetMinutes = null)

ToTimeZone(DateTime, TimeZoneRegion, UtcDirection, int?)

Converts a DateTime to the specified timezone or offset.

public static DateTime ToTimeZone(this DateTime value, TimeZoneRegion timeZoneRegion = TimeZoneRegion.Brasilia, UtcDirection utcDirection = UtcDirection.None, int? offsetMinutes = null)

Parameters

value DateTime

The input datetime.

timeZoneRegion TimeZoneRegion

The target region (optional if using offset).

utcDirection UtcDirection

Whether to convert to or from UTC.

offsetMinutes int?

Manual offset in minutes (optional).

Returns

DateTime

ToTimeZoneOffset(DateTimeOffset, TimeZoneRegion, int?)

Converts a DateTimeOffset to the specified timezone region or offset.

public static DateTimeOffset ToTimeZoneOffset(this DateTimeOffset value, TimeZoneRegion timeZoneRegion = TimeZoneRegion.Brasilia, int? offsetMinutes = null)
